directions: Combine and mix the tuna, apple, celery, yogurt, mustard and honey. When ready to serve, spread the mixture on a slice of bread and top with your extra veggies and another slice of bread. Makes enough for three sandwiches.
ingredients: 2 6-oz. cans unsalted tuna or chicken in water, drained
Â¼ cup low-fat vanilla or plain yogurt
title: Apple Tuna Salad Sandwich
